content: inches less than the desired final length finally knit one round and m1l at the end of the round there are now 33 37 41 sts on needle 1 and 32 36 40 sts on needle 2 switch to larger needles if desired and attach cc work chart b row 1-21 as follows in each round work chart b 8 9 10 times and finally work chart b st 1 once after finishing next round on needle 1 k4 *p1 k3* repeat chart b row 21 cut cc until 1 st remain k1 knit the sts on needle 2 switch to smaller needles if desired and knit work as described above until foot measures until 2 sts remain on needle 2 k2tog there approximately 3 3 5 4 cm / 1¼ 1⅜ 1½ are now 33 37 41 sts on needle 1 and 31 35 inches less than the desired foot length 39 sts on needle 2 priha socks page 3/4 toe abbreviations work the toe decreases as follows bor beginning of the round cc contrast colour round 1 on needle 1 k1 ssk work the co cast on established ribbing i e knit the knit stitches dpns double pointed needles and purl the purl stitches until 3 sts remain k knit k2tog k1 on needle 2 ssk knit until 2 sts k2tog knit 2 sts together remain k2tog mc main colour round 2 work the sts as they appear i e knit p purl the knit sts and purl the purl sts p2tog purl 2 sts together round s round s repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 23 25 29 sts ssk slip slip knit remain on needle 1 and 21 23 27 sts remain st s stitch es on needle 2 and you have just finished round 2 then repeat only round 1 until 13 15 17 sts remain on needle 1 and 11 13 15 sts remain on needle 2 finally work sts on needle 1 as follows k2tog knit until 2 sts remain ssk there are now 11 13 15 sts on each needle cut the yarn and graft the toe finishing soak the socks in lukewarm water remove excess water by rolling the socks inside a towel let dry flat or on sock blockers weave in the ends priha socks page 4/4
